description:
The Battle of Anegawa ended with the Azai and Asakura armies losing thousands of their troops. The Oda and Tokugawa allied forces celebrated a huge victory, and one of Azai’s castles, Yokoyama Castle, now belonged to the Oda clan. Yokoyama Castle was key to subduing the Azai clan, and our favorite monkey was left in charge of it.
Source: crunchyroll
